items.content_html: Primeval UI is a small and minimalistic UI framework with minimal dependencies. The framework doesn't care about browser support since it is meant to work only in evergreen browsers. It is meant to be lightweight and lightning fast without hundreds of components but only what's necessary.
items.title: leicht-io/primeval-ui: Primeval UI is a small and minimalistic UI framework with minimal dependencies. The framework doesn't care about browser support since it is meant to work only in evergreen browsers. It is meant to be lightweight and lightning fast without hundreds of components but only what's necessary.

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
